content: simple crochet gloves more of a recipe than a pattern yarn caron simply soft in raspberry and pink *nearly any yarn will work you probably want to use something washable * crochet hook us size k or size appropriate for your yarn glove is crocheted in the round in single_crochet stitch leaving an opening for the thumb ed note sample gloves illustrate use of contrast yarn around thumb different body color for left and right hand the website where this was originally located is no longer in service a copy 1 can be found in the internet archive please note that the archive can be intermittant 1 http //web archive org/web/20101107150154/http //cerise theirisnetwork org/2008/01/05/craft-check-gaming-gloves/
